mapper.select: select A.wflag, A.wrmc, B.machname, A.wperid, DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, A.wperid, '', '') wpernm FROM TB_FPLAN_WRMC A WITH(NOLOCK), TB_PC110 B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (A.wrmc = B.machnum) AND (wflag Like #{wflag} + '%') AND (A.wrmc lIKE '%' + #{machname} + '%' OR B.machname LIKE '%' + #{machname} + '%' )
select '' as wflag, '' as wrmc, '' as machname, '' as wperid, '' wpernm FROM dual

select A.custcd, A.spjangcd, A.plan_no, A.wseq, A.wflag, A.seq, A.pcode, Left(a.wotdt,4) + '-' + substring(a.wotdt, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.wotdt, 7,2) as wotdt, A.wqty, A.lotno, A.wqty, A.bqty as bqty, A.qty, B.JPUM as pname, B.jgugek as psize FROM TB_FPLAN_OWORK A , JCODE B WHERE A.pcode = B.JKEY AND A.plan_no = #{plan_no} and A.pcode = #{pcode} and wflag=#{wflag} and lotno=#{lotno}

SELECT B.com_code as linecd , B.com_cnam as linenm , C.com_code as wflagcd, C.com_cnam AS wflagnm, A.wflag as wflag, A.perid as wperid, DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, A.perid, '', '') wpernm, A.custcd, A.spjangcd FROM TB_FPLAN_WPER A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA510 B ON B.com_cls = '040' and B.com_code != '00' and LEFT(A.wflag,2) = B.com_code LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA510 C ON LEFT(C.com_cls,2) = '04' and SUBSTRING(C.com_cls, 3,1) = left( A.wflag ,1) and C.com_code != '00' and C.com_code = substring(A.wflag,3,6) WHERE A.wflag Like #{wflag} + '%' ORDER BY B.com_code, C.com_code, wpernm

SELECT A.com_rem2 as linecd , A.com_work as linenm , A.com_code as wperid, A.com_rem1 AS wpernm FROM TB_CA510 A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.com_code != '00' AND A.com_cls = '002' AND isnull(A.com_rem1, '') Like #{wpernm} + '%' ORDER BY A.com_rem1
SELECT A.com_code as wcode, A.com_rem1 AS wcdnm FROM TB_CA510 A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.com_code != '00' AND A.com_cls = '004' AND isnull(A.com_rem1, '') Like #{wpernm} + '%' ORDER BY A.com_code
SELECT A.com_code as wcode, A.com_rem1 AS wcdnm FROM TB_CA510 A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.com_code != '00' AND A.com_cls = '006' AND isnull(A.com_rem1, '') Like #{wpernm} + '%' ORDER BY A.com_code

select A.wflag, A.wrmc, A.wperid, A.wrmcnm wrmcnm, (SELECT com_rem1 from tb_ca510 where com_code=A.wperid and com_cls = '002') AS wpernm FROM TB_FPLAN_WRMC A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (A.wflag Like #{wflag} + '%') AND (A.wrmc lIKE '%' + #{machname} + '%' )

SELECT TB_CA510.com_code as wcode, TB_CA510.com_rem1 as wcdnm, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wbqty, 0) as wbqty, TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wseq as wseq , TB_FPLAN_WBAD.plan_no as plan_no, TB_FPLAN_WBAD.lotno as lotno FROM TB_CA510 WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON TB_CA510.com_code = TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wcode and TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wflag = #{wflag} and TB_FPLAN_WBAD.plan_no = #{plan_no} and TB_FPLAN_WBAD.lotno = #{lotno} WHERE TB_CA510.com_cls = '005' AND TB_CA510.com_code != '00'
SELECT TB_CA510.com_code as wcode, TB_CA510.com_rem1 as wcdnm FROM TB_CA510 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE TB_CA510.com_cls = '005' AND TB_CA510.com_code != '00' ORDER BY com_code

select A.seq seq , A.pcode pcode, B.jpum pname, B.jgugek psize, B.jdanwy punit, B.lotnodv lotnodv, A.qty qty, A.qty gqty, CAST(0.000 as DECIMAL(18, 3)) tqty FROM TB_FPLAN_BOM A WITH(NOLOCK), JCODE B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.pcode = B.jkey AND A.plan_no = #{plan_no} ORDER BY A.seq
select '' as seq, '' as pcode, '' as pname, '' as psize, '' punit, '' as lotnodv, 0 as qty, 0 as gqty, 0 as tqty FROM dual

SELECT A.custcd, A.spjangcd, A.plan_no, A.wseq, A.wflag, A.seq, A.pcode, B.jpum pname, B.jgugek psize, B.jdanwy punit, A.lotno, '' as opcltnm, A.store, A.jqty, A.sqty, A.qty, A.bqty, A.indate, A.inperid FROM TB_FPLAN_IWORK A WITH(NOLOCK), JCODE B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.pcode = B.jkey AND A.plan_no = #{plan_no} AND A.wseq = #{wseq} AND A.wflag = #{wflag} ORDER BY A.seq

{ call SP_POPUP_LOTNO_WFIWORK ('DAEBAK', 'ZZ', '%', '%', '%', '20000101', #{indate, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} , #{plan_no, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String}, '', #{wflag, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String}, '%') }

select '' as plan_no, '' as wseq, '' as wflag, '' as seq, '' as pcode, '' as pname, '' as psize, '' punit, '' as lotno, '' as opcltcd, '' as opcltnm, '' as opcono, '' as opdate, '' as store, 0 as jqty, 0 as sqty, 0 as qty, 0 as bqty, '' as indate, '' as inperid FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FPLAN_WTIME(custcd, spjangcd, plan_no, wseq, aseq, seq, wflag, wfrdt, wtrdt, wopdv, wdtcd, wrerm ) VALUES (#{custcd},#{spjangcd}, #{plan_no}, #{wseq}, #{aseq}, #{seq}, #{wflag},#{wfrdt},#{wtrdt},#{wopdv},#{wdtcd},#{wrerm} )
mapper.select: SELECT isnull(max(seq), '01') as seq FROM TB_FPLAN_WTIME WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE plan_no =#{plan_no}
SELECT TOP 1 seq FROM TB_FPLAN_WTIME WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE plan_no =#{plan_no} and wtrdt is null order by wfrdt desc
mapper.insert: UPDATE TB_FPLAN_WTIME SET wtrdt = #{wtrdt} WHERE plan_no =#{plan_no} AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT TB_CA510.com_code as wcode, TB_CA510.com_cnam as wcdnm, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wbqty, 0) as wbqty, TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wseq as wseq , TB_FPLAN_WBAD.plan_no as plan_no FROM TB_CA510 WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON TB_CA510.com_code = TB_FPLAN_WBAD.wcode AND TB_FPLAN_WBAD.plan_no = #{plan_no} AND TB_FPLAN_WBAD.lotno = #{lotno} WHERE TB_CA510.com_cls = '005' AND TB_CA510.com_code != '00'
select '' as wcode, '' as wcdnm, 0 as wbqty FROM dual
